name: Dug Pug
description:
CONTROLS:

  • ARROW KEYS - Move
  • X - Rotate counter-clockwise
  • C - Rotate clockwise
  • SPACE - Change info bar

GOAL:

Line up the bones in rows or columns of 6 to clear them! They'll drop automatically after a certain amount of time, so don't dilly-dally! Placing a bone on top of another loses 1 life: When you lose all 3, it's game over! Aim for a high-score!

TIPS:

  • Clearing multiple bones at once or in successive drops increases your COMBO, leading to extra points!
